name: rexlimddv2
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)), w1)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2), w1)

comment: Restricted existential elimination rule of natural deduction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
